inn1.comm: short in length, just outside off stump and Karthik, the new opener, gets behind the line to defend to the off side
hits the deck short of length, moves in towards middle and leg, glanced to fine-leg
starts with round the stumps right away for the left-handed Gambhir. It was punched  to the right of backward point but Bernard makes an excellent diving stop
drifts towards middle and leg, turned to square leg
hint of swing, moving away from Karthik who opens the bat-face to run it to third man
length delivery homing in on the off stump, pushed to extra cover for a single.
gentle seam-up delivery around the off stump, steered to backward point
fulll in length, just outside off stump, quicker, Karthik gets forward to push it to the off side
Thump. It was slightly short in length but outside off stump, Karthik was looking to come forward, shifted his weight before cutting it real hard past point
guided to third man for a single
Wallop. What a slap-dash that was. He charged down the track and knifed through the line of the short-of-length delivery. Up and over long-on. It was hit on the up.
dabs this one to cover point and retains the strike
The first bouncer of the day. It was short and climbing outside off, Gambhir tried to upper cut it but couldn't reach
One slip, short extra-cover in and they watch as Gambhir runs the back-of-length delivery to third man
length delivery coming in towards the off stump, Karthik pushes it close on the off side and rushes across for a quick single
The second bouncer. Gambhir ducks. The ball perhaps moving down the leg side. Taylor was surprised it has been given a wide.
bangs it in short again, doesn't climb all that high, cut down to backward point where Bernard makes a neat stop
lifting delivery outside off, Gambhir hops to get on top of the bounce and keeps it down and to right of Bernard at backward point
fuller, slower one, outside off stump, steered to third man for a single
around the off stump, nudged to the off side for a single
full, 81.8 mph, on the off stump line, defended to backward point
85.4 mph, length delivery on the off and middle line, Karthik dabs it to the off side.
short and climbing around the middle stump line, gets on top of the bounce to defend it to the off side
sprays it down the leg side and the umpire Nigel Llong extends his arms
82.4 mph full pitched delivery just outside off stump, Karthik comes forward, opens the bat-face and runs it to point region
It was slightly short in length and Karthik went after it with a fierce pull but straight to short midwicket
from round the stumps, fullish, on the middle, coming in with that angle, pushed to Sarwan at mid-on
full and outside off stump, driven through covers for a single. Darren, the younger Bravo, rushes after it, picks the ball, turns behind to fire the throw to Ramdin

Ooh la la! the bouncer has done the trick. Again. That sinking Twenty20 feeling again. Well-directed pacy bouncer on the middle stump, from round the stumps, Gambhir took his eyes off the ball, yanked his head away from the line but tried to go through with the pull shot. Mistake. The ball took the top edge and lobbed to square leg.

from over the wicket, Taylor tries to surprise him with a yorker length delivery but lands it just short of the blockhole and Rohit does well to quickly take out his front leg from the line and flicks it past square leg .
back of length and just outside off stump, punched to left of backward point where Dwayne Bravo intercepts and has a shy at the striker's end
Full again, just outside off stump, squeezed off the outer edge to third man
short in length outside off stump, Rohit punches it to cover
a tad fuller, just outside off stump, driven to extra-cover region. Tony Cozier says "Sarwan laboured after it from mid-off. I wonder whether he is fully fit."
full in length, tailing in late, Karthik leans forward to defend and inside-edges it to his pad
back of length delivery and Karthik goes for the pull but doesn't connect well. It wasn't all that short
fuller, straightening on the off and middle line, good nagging line and length, Karthik gets forward to defend
takes a couple of steps down the track and heaves the length delivery over wide mid-on for couple of runs
88.9 mph lands on a length around the off stump, moves in a touch, Rohit jabs it to the on side
88.9 mph length delivery outside the off stump, left alone.
fullish, just outside off stump, squeezed to point
full again, straighter, on the middle stump, turned to the on side
Full again, he hasn't bowled a bouncer so far at Rohit;  has kept him waiting. This one tails towards middle and leg and rolls away off the pad
87.7 mph almost yorker-length delivery on the off stump, pushed out to point region
a tad short in length and outside off stump, cut down to third man for a single

Would you believe it? Another man goes down to the short-pitched delivery. Rohit goes for an unconvincing pull and top edges it to deep square-leg region. Taylor hadn't bowled a bouncer at Rohit and had kept him waiting. And Lionel Baker threw in the knockout punch with a short delivery outside off stump and Rohit tried to fetch it from there.
full in length, outside off, defended to the off side
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
83.6 mph, full in length, straightening outside off stump, Karthik stabs it and it bounces back in and rolls past his stumps
full in length, on the middle stump line, defended to the on side of the pitch. Free hit coming up.
The high bouncer outside off stump, DK goes for the pull and top-edges it to the fine-leg boundary.
The yorker just outside leg stump, Yuvraj was caught on the shuffle, missed his flick and the ball moved past the leg stump. Ramdin can't believe it missed the leg stump
full pitched outside off stump, guided to wide third man region
slower one, 69.5 mph off cutter on the off stump line, cut down to third man
full again, just outside off stump, pushed to the on side of the pitch. Time for that bouncer Taylor?
What a jaffa! It landed back of length, just outside leg stump and cut away right across Yuvraj who was squared-up completely. Ramdin gathers.
fuller, on the middle, worked to midwicket
87.6 mph yorker on the middle stump line, Karthik crouches to dig it out
82.9 mph delivery landing on a length around the off stump, Yuvraj gets across to push it carefully to the off side
full and angling away from Yuvraj who pushes inside the line and is beaten. The ball bounces before it reaches Ramdin who doesn't take it cleanly
leans across to defend a length delivery to point region

loud shout for a caught-behind decision from Ramdin. It cut in sharply, went through the bat and pad gap, brushed the right thigh en route to Ramdin who went up in appeal. The bowler joined in late. Lovely delivery, though.
gets off strike with a dab-shot to third man
beaten comprehensively again. It landed on a length and cut away from the stumps and once again, squared-up Yuvraj.
80.9 mph full delivery almost floated full well outside off and Karthik smashes it through wide mid-off.
81.3 mph length delivery and its steered to third man
85.1 mph short-of-length delivery, swatted away past square leg for a single
short in length and outside off stump, guided to third man for a single
pushed wide outside off stump. Bravo is yet to settle down here.
on a length, on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
full and moving away from Yuvraj who is beaten, going for the cover drive.
full in length, moving in from outside off stump, defended on the front foot
fuller, around the off stump, Karthik leans forward, gets right behind the line to defend it compactly
on the middle and leg and that line allows Karthik to wrist it for a single
angling away from Yuvraj who allows it to pass him
overpitched outside off stump, line and length went awry there, and Yuvraj square drives it through cover point for a easy boundary
stays back to punch a length delivery to mid-off
full and moving down the leg side, rolls off the pad to fine-leg
beaten on the drive again. It was angling away from Yuvraj who didn't quite lean across and didn't get close to the line of the ball
checks his on drive and ends up chipping it in the air but it falls short of mid-on
outside off stump, Yuvraj tries to cut it away but can't connect
pushes it across Yuvraj who cuts to backward point

almost holed out to sweeper cover. Yuvraj moved down the track and went for the big hit over the off-side field but ended up slicing it high towards deep cover but the ball lands short of the fielder rushing in
stretches forward to defend to the off side
short and wide, cut hard and it flew to the backward point boundary. Whack.
80.2 mph length delivery on the off stump line, driven on the up and straight to cover
back of length, on the off stump line, guided to backward point
79,5 mph full delivery outside off stump, Karthik glides forward to ease it to left of mid-off
in the channel outside off stump, Karthik is beaten, trying to steer it to third man
short in length, on the middle and leg, turned to short fine-leg region
moving well down the leg side
short in length, outside off stump, Karthik punches it through covers
full in length outside off stump, driven on the up and well but Dwayne stretches his left hand out to make the stop

Run out  of Karthik missed. It was pushed to cover point and they set off  for a run. Karthik froze as he saw Bernard rush across from backward point but Yuvraj kept running. Bernard makes a tumbling stop and throws towards the stumps, Bravo was in front of stumps and let it go, thinking it would hit the stumps direct and Bernard is not happy.
slashed away through the off side for a single
goes forward and drives a length delivery on the up and through the line over mid-on for a fine boundary
slightly short of a good length on the off, held its line there and Yuvraj took his bottom-hand off just as he prodded at it, rolled down to point
straying on the pads this time, flicked away stylishly towards deep midwicket, called for the second but Karthik wasn't ready
a harmless delivery angling in towards middle and leg, dropped wide of midwicket for an easy single
swing and a miss, length delivery outside off, Yuvraj's eyes lit up, attempted to clear the deep-midwicket boundary there but made no contact
tight line this, on middle and off, gets back and pushes it back to the bowler
slower one, full toss on the off stump but Yuvraj didn't pick it, adjusted at the last moment and dabbed it back to the bowler
shortish on the off, gets back and whips it behind square, gracefully done, was on his toes as he played that
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, driven off the front foot to mid-off

dropped it short, they've bowled plenty of those today, and for good reason, the Indians have struggled to play it, Yuvraj goes for the pull this time and mistimes it, ends up slicing it into the vacant space wide of midwicket
another one, Yuvraj gave him the charge and the bowler, the smart guy that he is, bowled a bounce seeing the batsmen walking forward, Yuvraj could only let it go
short of a good length on the off, defended back to the bowler
it had been a good over so far but he strays down the leg side this time to spoil it somewhat, wide signalled
teasing him outside off this time, pushed off the front foot to cover, Yuvraj is 14 in 31, quite unusual
back of a length on middle, drops it down with soft hands and sets off, easy single
mistimes a pull again, dribbles along to long-on
slower one bowled fullish outside off, leans into the drive and eases it to long-off
down the leg side, another wide, there have been seven of those today, not good going
slower one bowled slightly short on the off stump, guided behind a diving point for a single
angling into the off stump from wide of the crease, prods it wide of point for a single, direct hit at the striker's end but the batsman was way safe
nicely timed, full toss the off stump, chips it in the massive gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on

dropped, but would be really unfair to say that, short of a good length on middle, Yuvraj stood tall and pushed it firmly back to Bravo who dived forward acrobatically but could not get his hands around it, would have been a ripper had he held on to it, but great effort nevertheless
bangs it in short on the off, pulls it down to deep midwicket
pushed to mid-off and gets a quick single, the fielder there was a little late to react allowing the batsman enough time to run through
fullish on middle and off, opens the face slightly and guides it wide of point for a single
bad ball but doesn't get the treatment, short and wide, slashed away but hardly any force on it, goes to deep point for a single
on the off stump line, tapped to backward point

A paddle-scoop for a six! and that's his fifty. Karthik was Dilshan's team-mate in IPL. He stretched across to outside off stump and paddle-scooped it stunningly over fine-leg boundary. He was outside off stump when he played that shot
leans forward to defend to the off side
full and outside off, driven to cover
on the off stump line, pushed to left of cover for a single
outside off stump, steered to backward point
short in length and outside off, cut hard to deep point region
drifts to the leg side and short as well, Yuvraj pulls it away past the short fine-leg fielder. Easy pickings.
better line and length - around the off stump- defended to the on side
lunges out to drag the slog sweep to deep square leg region
on the off stump line, pushed to right of backward point for a single
on the middle stump line, tickled to short fine-leg for a single
flat and on the off and middle line, pushed back to Gayle, who is wearing the coolers
sign of turn there. Yuvraj was pushing forward to defend and the ball spun past his bat
drags it short and Yuvraj rocks back to pull it high over midwicket boundary. Done effortlessly. And in style.
cut to deep point for a single
leans forward to work it to midwicket
floated outside off stump, tries to turn it to the on side, misses and the ball goes past the off stump
full and outside off stump, left alone
Another huge slog sweep. This was gorgeous to watch as well. He went down on his knee and thrashed it into the midwicket stands.
turns it past square leg for a single
stretches forward to push a flighted delivery to cover
fuller, outside off stump, driven to deep cover

full and just outside off stump, squeezed to short third man region, Karthik wanted a single but is sent back. The throw, though, shoots past the stumps at the non-striker's end and runs down to long-on.
short and outside off stump, cut to right of deep point. The outfield is pretty slow here, today.

Biggie. The midwicket boundary is being peppered by Yuvraj Singh. It was another short delivery and Yuvraj goes back and nonchalantly pulls it high over the boundary. Too short again from Gayle. That one traveled to 92 metres. It's a car parking space in that cowcorner and the ball seems to have been lost. And they have found the ball now.
yorker length delivery  - good comeback from Gayle- dug out to the off side
leans forward to wrist it past square leg for two runs and that's his 41st ODI fifty. He started off scratchily but is now rattling along at a frenetic pace.
retains the strike with a wristy dab to square leg
turns in from outside off, swung away to long-on
slower. full and outside off, swept to long leg for a single
beaten by the quicker one outside off stump, Yuvraj had a hurried stab and missed it
slows up the pace but pitches it full and outside off, in the slot, and Yuvraj thrashes it to wide long-off boundary. Not a man move.
turns the strike with a flick to square leg
drifts to the pads, turned to deep backward square leg for a single
on the middle and off stump line, full, flicked past square leg and he has handed the strike back to Yuvraj
goes back to punch it down to long-on
quicker one but short in length, cut away to deep backward point region for couple of runs
turning into the pads, turned tp short fine-leg where Taylor makes a mess of it
short in length and flatter, cut away to left of short third man where Sarwan dives over the ball!
full and outside off stump, Karthik was looking to sweep it, misses and it runs off the pad for a leg bye
72.7 mph length delivery on the off stump line, punched to long-off
full pitched and slightly wide outside off stump, Karthik reaches out to square drive it high over backward point.
shapes to sweep it past short fine-leg but Bernard, perhaps anticipating it, hurled it full and outside off and Karthik is hit on the pad
gets forward to drive through the off side for a single
low full toss on the leg stump line and Yuvraj laps it around the corner to the deep backward square leg boundary.
very full on the off stump line, squeezed through cover point
pushes the full delivery to the off side
full again, driven to long-off for a single
on the leg stump line, flicked to short fine-leg
full and straight, pushed to the on side of the pitch
full and straight ,can't put that away .. good over
leans across to drive to cover
length delivery on the off stump, pushed to cover
fullish, on the middle, on driven to long-on
The paddle-scoop has done him in this time. He fetched it from outside off but only scooped it straight up for Ramdin to hold a simple catch. Bernard had taken pace off that ball
full in length, around the off stump, steered to backward point
length delivery moving in towards off stump, defended to the off side
stays back to work the flat and quick delivery to deep square leg
quick again, on the off stump line, leans forward to defend
full, quick,  and outside off stump, Yuvraj went for his slog sweep but mistimed it and ended up dragging it to square leg
slower, outside off stump, full, left alone
stretches across to square drive to deep point region
yorker length just outside off stump, dug out back down the pitch
low dipping full toss on the leg and middle, flicked to deep backward square leg

Bernard slips and falls as he releases the ball - it was a length delivery punched to cover - . The trouser is torn and he asks the umpire to cut it off from below knee height! The right leg trouser is till knee high. The crowd roar
leans forward to push to point
square drives it for couple of runs
just outside off stump, guided to third man
yorker on the off stump line, stabbed to point region
drives this to long-on for a single. Dhoni on strike.
slower through the air, full and outside off, driven to sweeper cover
quicker, just outside off stump, Yuvraj takes the bottom-hand off the handle and jabs the ball through cover point
full and outside off, steered to backward point
on the middle stump line, gets forward to defend
stretches forward to push it through cover point for a single
full pitched on the middle and off, driven to long-off. Bernard had gone in at the end of last over and has got himself a new trouser
low dipping full toss, on driven to long-on
low full toss again, looking for the yorker, punched to long-off
full and moving down the leg side, Ramdin collects
slower one, full, pushed back to the bowler
yorker length but slips down the leg side, Yuvraj tries to flick it but doesn't connect
length delivery on the leg and middle line, defended on the front foot
again drifting to the leg side and this time, Yuvraj flicks it past short fine-leg fielder.
turned to short fine-leg for a single
Awesome. He moved outside leg and smoked a length delivery over covers.
yorker length delivery outside off stump, tries to steer it to third man region but doesn't connect
low full toss outside off stump and Yuvraj crouches, gets down on his knee to time it superbly through extra cover
Yuvraj moves to 98 in style. Again, he goes down on the back knee, like he would to a spinner, and swings it high over midwicket boundary. Dhoni and Yuvraj smile as they have a chat.
full delivery, pushed to the off side for a quick single .
100 for Yuvraj who celebrates by jumping in the air and pumping his fist. It was pushed to point and they rushed across for the quick single. He started slowly but has exploded in style later on.
worked through midwicket for a single . Yuvraj back on strike.
full in length, from round the stumps, slower one, leans forward to defend to the off side
Yuvraj keeps rollicking on here. Full and down leg side, Yuvraj flicks it past short fine-leg fielder
Fabulous six over cover boundary. He moved outside leg stump, picked the slower one and lifted it superbly over cover.
Rock on Yuvraj. It was short of length delivery on the leg stump line and Yuvraj plays a neat swat-pull to deep backward square-leg boundary
full and on the middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
driven uppishly past extra cover and Dhoni will come back for the second run
full and straight, dragged past square leg for a single
quicker and flatter outside off, Yuvraj tries to cut but doesn't connect
slightly short again, flat-bats it past the bowler to long-off
goes down the track, Benn shortens the length and Dhoni lunges to push it through cover point
Thump. Dhoni is smiling big after playing his special bottom-handed scoop over long-on! It was  short of the block hole and Dhoni used his bottom-hand to pick it cleanly over long-on.
length delivery moves in past the prod but they will pick up a leg bye
Crash. Bang. Wallop. It was a short delivery outside off stump and Yuvraj pulled it to the cowcorner for a six.
The sixes keep flooding in. What a knock. Full pitched outside off stump and Yuvi has lifted it high over long-off. Lovely swing of the bat.
fullish, on the middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket region
87.7 mph, just short of the blockhole, Yuvraj tries to hit it to the on side but seems to have hit his boot with his bat. He is limping a touch.
Dhoni hands the strike to Yuvraj with a drive to long-on
he fetches it from outside off and swings it to long-on
Dhoni rushes down the track, Benn fires it in yorker length, dug out back to the bowlet
ful again, just short of being a yorker, turned to midwicket
quick and flat, mistimes it to midwicket
moves outside leg stump and swings it to deep midwicket

And Yuvraj is gone now. Storm abates. It was full and down the leg side, poor delivery actually, Yuvraj edges the flick behind the wicket and Ramdin dives to his right to take a very fine catch. What a knock though from Yuvraj. Powerpacked and entertaining. It was a pleasure to watch.
Two in two. It was full and angling away from Jadeja who has a lame poke at it. Fatal.
prevents the hat-trick by stretching well forward to defend
short in length, on the middle and off, tapped to backward point
full and on the middle, worked through midwicket for a single
leans forward to defend to the off side
yorker length on the middle, pushed to the on side of the pitch
on the off stump line, slight turn, edged to the point region
quicker, straighter, on the middle, defended on the front foot
errs on the shorter side this time, cut to deep point
low dipping full toss on the middle and leg, wristed to deep backward square leg
lunges forward edge the turning delivery to short third man
on the middle and leg line, nudged to backward square leg
slower one, full and on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
from wide of the crease, on the middle, full in length, worked to midwicket for a single
length delivery just outside off stump, sliced to backward point
full and moving in, hit uppishly towards long-off for a single
length delivery on the off stump line, dabbed away to the off side
full and quick, hit down to long-on for a single
skips down the track and turns it to square leg for a single
slightly short in length, tries to sweep, misses and the ball rolls off the pad
full and outside off, cut to backward point
goes for the yorker, ends up as a dipping full toss, turned past square leg
on the off stump, skidding on, defended to the off side
82.6 mph short delivery, Yusuf goes for the pull but can't connect.
cutting in from outside off stump, punched to mid-off for a single
moves down the track, Bravo slips in a slower one, pushed down to long-on
full pitched on the middle stump line, dragged to deep midwicket
length delivery on the middle, swatted away for a single
full toss swinging down the leg side and all Yusuf had to do was to get bat on ball and he did it
on the legs, flicked to deep backward square leg for a single
walks down the track and across towards the off side, tries to work a length delivery across the line, misses and is struck on the pad just outside off stump
short in length, hit away to long-on for a single
takes a couple of steps down the track, the bowler shortens the length and Dhoni opens the bat-face to guide it to left of backward point for a single
slips in a slower one, full and outside off, swing and a miss from Yusuf
moves down the leg side, past the attempted flick and Ramdin makes a tumbling stop.
from round the stumps, full in length, on the middle, pushed back to Taylor.
on the pads,fails to put wood on leather and it runs off the thigh pad to short fine-leg fielder
still from round the stumps, full in length and on the middle and leg, nudged to the on side
He got away last time but not now. Again on the leg and middle line from round the stumps and Dhoni wrists it past short fine-leg
shorter, on the middle stump line, Dhoni misses the pull but will collect a leg bye. Oh the umpire reckons there was some inside-edge there
pushed to the off side. Dot ball.
full in length on the off stump line, mistimes the drive to cover
full in length on the off stump line, hit down to long-off
a tad short in length, Dhoni tries to force it off the back foot but ends up mistiming it to cover
moves to the off side and paddles a short of length delivery from outside off to the right of short fine-leg fielder
hmm ... he tries to reverse sweep/paddle this time, misses and it bounds off the fore arm
Yusuf goes down town. He clears the front leg and swings the full delivery high over wide long-on
still from round the stumps, but slips it down the leg side for a wide
shorter in length, Dhoni fails to connect with the pull but will rush across for the leg bye
Dhoni falls, attempting to steal a leg bye. It moved past the hurried prod and rolled towards Ramdin. Dhoni rushed across but is caught short of the crease by direct hit from Ramdin
gets forward to push it through mid-on
91.4 mph hurries Yusuf who edges it to his pad and the ball rolls to right of the keeper
moves outside leg stump and slices a full delivery to third man boundary.
backs outside leg stump, Taylor fires in a yorker, Yusuf edges his attempted big hit to the on side. But t'was another no-ball from Taylor.
cleans up the stump with a full delivery. Harbhajan had opened-up his stance and tried to swing across the line but missed it completely.
walks down the track and whips the full delivery to deep square leg
full toss, swung to backward square leg where Sarwan does well to stop it; it was spinning away from him
dipping yorker length delivery, jabbed to midwicket
walks down the track, Bravo slips in a full toss and Harbhajan lifts it over long-on. Fierce whack.
slower one and Harbhajan checks his shot and the ball bounces back to the bowler
picks the slower one early and swings it high and to the wide midwicket boundary where Darren Bravo manages to push it back from the ropes before he goes over the line
goes for a big hit, doesn't connect properly as he edges it to his pad
moves outside leg but Taylor follows him, short-arm pulled to deep midwicket
edges another slog to left of Ramdin who makes a tumbling stop
very fine yorker on the middle, from round the stumps, dug out to the off side
yet another yorker- superb over this - pushed out through mid-on region and by the time Benn rushes in from the deep, they turn back for the second
just short of the blockhole, driven to deep midwicket
moves outside leg stump, Bravo goes for the yorker but ends up hurling a low full toss which has diappeared over deep backward square leg. Whoosh.
The bat goes flying out of Yusuf's hands. A big swing and a miss and the bat is out as well. Yusuf smiles.
drags the slower one from outside off to square leg where Chanders makes a diving stop
bangs it in short, Harbhajan flat-bats it to long-off
swung to deep midwicket for a single. Harbhajan thinks about a second but the throw is accurate and quick.
Yusuf hugs Harbhajan who is all smiles after the big hit to finish the innings. He picked the slower one early, went down on his knee and thrashed it high over long-on boundary.

inn2.comm: back of length around the off stump and curves away a touch, Gayle adjusts to push it to the off side
in the channel outside off, Gayle covers the off stump and allows it to pass him
homing in on the off stump line, nudged to square leg
Crash. Full and well outside off stump, Gayle drives it hard through extra cover
goes hard again but ends up mistiming and dragging it to the on side of the pitch
fetches from outside off and drags it to short midwicket
This is Nehra's comeback after nearly four years. Here he goes. The first one is angled across Morton who shoulders arms.
81.6 mph length delivery moving past Morton who tries to stab it and is beaten
full in length, on the off stump line, leans forward to defend to the off side
full and on the legs, misses the flick but will collect the leg bye.
84.2 mph full and hint of away swing, Gayle is squared-up as he adjusts to the late movement and defends
in the zone outside off stump, left alone. Karthik rushes across pat Nehra on the back as he collects his cap from the umpire
goes hard at the ball and ends up mistiming it away
leans forward to turn it to the on side

good length outside off, has a swing at it and it pays off, albeit not the way he would have ideally wanted, gets a thick inside edge through the midwicket region and it rolls along the ground for a four
pushed off the front foot wide of Ravindra Jadeja at extra cover for a single
oversteps, freehit coming, testing him outside off, defended solidly by Morton, gets a crack at the next one

was in the slot, but again, did not connect the way he would have wanted to, length ball on the off, tries to smash it over the bowlers head, gets a thick outside edge over point for a boundary, he'll take it
slightly short outside off, punched to Harbhajan at mid-off, takes a quick single
short of a good length outside off, dabs at it, gets a thick edge down to third man
ooh almost, some short-ball treatment from Nehra this time, goes for the hook, got a thick edge onto his helmet and it fell short of slip
full and on the middle, turned to wide midwicket
short in length, outside off, dragged to midwicket
short in length and outside off, Gayle has simply crashed it on the up and over mid-off.
full and just outside off, again another one of the mistimed drags to the on side.
in the zone outside off stump, curving away, Gayle can't reach it. Very close to being called a wide.
on a length, just outside off stump, defended to cover. The crowd roar as they see the no-ball call and the free-hit sign.
Biff. Full and well outside off stump, Gayle crouched a touch, bent his knees to hold the balance and swung imperiously over long-off.
82 mph full delivery outside off stump, pushed to right of Harbhajan at mid-off for a single
74.4 mph slightly slower outside off stump, Gayle lets it go.
cuts in from outside off, pushed away towards cover, Jadeja swoops in and has a shy at the striker's end
full in length outside off , pushed towards mid-off where Harbhajan fields and has a direct hit at the striker's end
short in length, on the off stump line, punched to extra cover where the ball bounces awkwardly in front of Jadeja who ends up deflecting it towards mid-off
sprays to the legs, flicked away for a single
short in length and straightening outside off and mistimed to cover
again, straightening outside off stump, punched to right of mid-off for a single
84.6 mph length delivery on the off stump line, pushed out to cover
strays to the hips and Gayle short-arm pulls it to the deep backward square leg boundary. Both played for the same team in the IPL
length delivery on the off stump line, Gayle clears his front foot and punches it down the pitch and it bounces over the tall Ishant and rolls to right of mid-off
87 mph back of length delivery outside off, Morton has a slog across the line but doesn't connect
slower one on the off stump line, coming in a touch, Gayle takes out the bottom-hand off the handle as he pushes the ball to the off side
cuts in from outside off, Gayle edges it to his pad
short in length, just outside off, placed to left of mid-on
Swing and a miss from Morton as he didn't pick the slower one. The ball bounces before Dhoni who tries to get his pad in the way but it ricochets off the pad to fine-leg boundary
outside off stump, moving across Morton to Dhoni

on the leg stump line, glanced to right of fine-leg where Ishant charges across and fires in a throw to Nehra, standing in the middle of the pitch. Nehra turns and under-arms a throw wide of the striker's end and Gayle is home
slips in a slower one, Gayle is early into his big swing across the line but has enough meat on the ball to clear midwicket
Thump. It was a short of length delivery on the stumps, Gayle clears his front leg and thwacks it over mid-on
opens-up his stance and flat-bats it back down the pitch, Ishant makes a half-stop
sharp bouncer and Morton sways away from the line
full in length outside off stump, punched straight to short cover
short in length, on the off stump line, pushed towards Yuvraj at mid-on
full pitched around the off stump, Morton swings it between Yusuf, at short mid-off, and GAyle
works it to fine-leg for a single
Nehra gets the big wicket of Chris Gayle in his comeback game. It was short in length and Gayle went for the pull but mistimed it wide of mid-on where Harbhajan ran to his left to take a neat catch.
full in length, around the off stump, mistimes the drive back to Nehra
Nice pull. It was short in length and Morton spanked it through midwicket
on the middle and leg line, on a length, turned to square leg for a signle
drifts in full towards the pad and rolls away to short fine-leg
flighted full, driven back to the bowler
leans forward to defend to the off side
on the off and middle, worked to midwicket
And again.
drifting in towards middle stump, defended on the front foot. Fine start from Jadeja.
almost at the yorker length, pushed past midwicket
slower, on the middle, turned to midwicket
goes back to clip it to square leg but is hit on the pad
strides forward to on drive to long-on
on the middle, driven to Harbhajan at long-on
quicker, flatter, turned past square leg for a single
takes a positive stride forward and whacks the flighted delivery to wide long-on boundary but he has gone down in pain. Cramps. The umpires have called for drinks break.
leans forward to turn it through the on side
on the leg and middle, worked past square leg
flighted full, driven to extra cover
arm-ball on the off stump, chopped to backward point
floated on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
charges down the track and lifts it superbly over long-off. Very nonchalantly and skilfully done
spins towards pads, turned to short fine-leg
skips down the track, Yusuf shortens the length, jabbed to the on side
turns down the leg side and Dhoni is hit on the knee
slightly short, quicker one, pulled away
flighted on the off stump, presents the full face and drives it to long-off
quicker through the air, angles it wide of point
dropped it short, danced down the track and punched it to long-off
fortunate, was beaten by the spin, kept a little low and spun away  touch, Morton came down the track and drove inside the line, got a thick edge to the third-man boundary
on middle and off, drops it back on the pitch
pushed through quick, fired it on middle and leg and Morton was rapped on the pads as he came forward to push at that one, got a thin inside edge
slightly short on middle, whipped away to deep midwicket
tossed up on middle, tickled behind square off the front foot
spun back in sharply, too close to cut, just dabs it towards point
came back in again, made room and guided that behind point

slightly short on middle and spinning down leg, Morton tries to tickle that fine but it goes straight to the keeper Dhoni who appeals for caught-behind and wins the umpire's approval, Morton wasn't happy there, we'll need replays to confirm what happened. It seems to have gone off the thigh pad
round the wicket, shuffles and works that away behind square for a single,he's off
full and outside off, pushed to extra cover
drives for a single. And one replay suggested it went off Morton's thigh pad
leans forward to wrist it past square leg
flatter, quicker, outside off, left alone
shuffles across to work with the turn to square leg
stays back to punch towards long-off
flighted full, on driven to long-on
Slip in place. Chanderpaul leans across to tickle it to square leg
floated outside off stump, cut away to deep point
on the off and middle, turned past midwicket
fires it across but slips it down leg side
slower, on a length around off stump, jabbed away to the off side
full and on the middle and leg, worked past midwicket
on the middle stump line, gets forward to push it to the on side
backs away to punch it through covers
flighted full outside off, driven to long-on
skips down the track but drives it back to the bowler
floated full outside off, chipped inside-out to deep cover
turns in from outside off, cut to Nehra at deep point
flighted ever so slowly on the off stump line, pushed towards cover, Sarwan sets off, is sent back by Chanderpaul who initially showed interest in the single, and gets back in time ..
on the middle and leg, turned to deep backward square leg
Sars is playing the spinners well here. He skipped down the track, reached the pitch and lifted it with the turn over midwicket boundary.
turning in from outside off, defended to the off side
comes down the track and defends the doosra
a tad quicker and flatter but turns down leg side
full outside off stump, pushed to point
full on a length outside off stump, taken on the pad
slower, outside off, swept away for a single
drifting to middle and leg, wristed to square leg for a quick single. Chanderpaul makes it in time before turning back and smiling at Sarwan
quicker, wristed through square leg for a single
skips down the track and chips the short-of-length delivery to deep midwicket
goes for the sweep, misses and is struck on the pad outside off stump
moves down the track and drives to long-on
slower, lands outside leg and turns past the prod to Dhoni
stays back to tap it to square leg
just outside off stump, steered to cover point
flighted on the leg and middle, defended to cover
spinning towards off stump, pushed to the off side
flighted slowly outside off, Sarwan wanted to go inside-out but edged it just short of short third-man
driven to extra cover for a single
moves down the track and drags the lofted shot to wide long-on region.
pushes it outside off stump, cut to deep point
sprays to the leg side and Sarwan gets a faint tickle on the clip shot and it runs away to the fine-leg boundary
spins outside off stump, tries to cut it through cover but misses it
allows it to spin to the off side, nudged to cover point
goes down the track to on drive to long-on
Chanders moves down the track but is beaten in the flight and adjusts by taking it on his pad
fuller, outside off, driven to long-off
sees Sarwan coming down the pitch and flattens the trajectory, defended back down the pitch
slightly short in length, cut away for a single
on the off stump line, guided to short third man
takes couple of steps down and hits to long-off
floated outside off stump, cut to Harbhajan at point
fuller, straighter, driven to right of long-on for a single
Top shot! Sars went down the track, reached the pitch and just timed it straight over the bowler's head. No violence. He just sought timing and achieved it purrfectly. Delightful and classy hit.

Sarwan is run out. He cut to deep backward point and turned for the second run. But couldn't make it back in time to beat the throw from RP Singh. Dhoni broke the stumps to beat the desperate lunge from Sarwan
pushed past midwicket for a single
flgihted off break, lunges forward to defend and is struck on the pad
spins down leg side, goes past the attempted flick and Dhoni takes out the bails.
turns in from outside off, Bravo goes back to deflect it to midwicket
flighted full outside off, flicked to midwicket
a tad quicker, full and on the off and middle, defended back to the bowler
slower, flighted delivery, full, turned to square leg
short in length outside off but curves away and so, Chanderpaul mistimes his cut
swings to long-on for a single
drifts outside leg, hit to deep backward square leg
quicker one, full, Chanderpaul shapes to drive but the ball curves away and goes past the outside edge. Dhoni appeals for a catch but turned down.
tries to flick it but gets a leading edge to point
sweeps it to deep backward square leg region where Nehra makes a diving stop
lands outside off stump, Bravo stretches forward to push it to cover for a single
slower, on the middle and leg, turned to left of midwicket where Rohit Sharma swoops on the ball, turns around and fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end  but Chanderpaul is home.
tries to move down the track but Harbhajan shortened the length and Bravo lunged out to jab it away.
goes right back to clip the off break through the on side for a single
flighted on the middle and off, pushed to cover
goes back to clip it to midwicket
turns from middle and leg, Bravo gets his bat in front of his pad to defend
skips down the track but again, doesn't reach the pitch of the ball and lunges out in the end to stab it away
goes back and punches a quicker one to long-off
slightly short and Chanderpaul jumped on it to pull it high over long-on. Big hit. It wasn't all that short but he forced it away superbly
charges down the track and whacks this one over long-off. Two sixes in a row. Chanderpaul has decided that the white ball must fly.
full, edges the drive to his pad
Bravo welcomes Ishant with a flamboyant inside-out airy drive to sweeper cover
turned towards midwicket and Bravo seems to had charged across but he turned back to get into the crease. the throw misses the stumps and now, they take the single
short in length, moving in, clipped through square leg
Banged in short of length and Chanderpaul pulls off the front foot to the wide midwicket boundary
fuller, Chanderpaul drags the intended big drive to midwicket
hurls across a bouncer, pulled to fine-leg for a single. He sort of helped it around the corner.
length delivery on the off and middle, Chanderpaul wants to swing it to the cowcorner but mistimes it towards long-on
swing and a miss. 83.5 mph length delivery moves past Bravo. Chanderpaul goes across for a chat
walks down the track and flicks a full length delivery to right of mid-on where Gambhir makes a fine diving stop
full pitched on the middle, driven to long-on for a single
fullish, on the middle, turned to Harbhajan at midwicket
in the zone outside off, tries to late-cut it but doesn't put bat to ball.
pushes it full and outside off stump. Chanderpaul can't reach it.
on the leg stump line, bounds off the pad to fine-leg
backs to the leg sdiea nd punches on the up but straight to Harbhajan at mid-off
comes down the track, Ishant searches for the blockhole, squeezed through cover point
slower one, full and on the leg stump line, Chanderpaul tries to turn it to the on side, misses but will take the leg bye

high full toss, Bravo edges the attempted pull to cover where Rohit Sharma catches the ball and throws at the non-striker's end. It was above waist-high and Bravo was expecting it to be called a no-ball. Perhaps, that's what Rohit also thought as he went for the run out. But the umpires have ruled Bravo out. No no-ball signal came and Bravo walked off unhappily.  His young brother walks in.
leans forward to push it to the off side

Really full delivery around the off stump line, Darren shaped to drive and the ball crashed into his boot and ran away through the vacant slip region. But it has been given as runs. The debutant will take it, though.
And no doubts this time. RP drifts to the pad and Darren clips it to fine-leg boundary.
full and in the channel outside off, Darren is beaten outside off stump
just outside off stump, run down to third man
just outside off stump, jabbed to the off side for a single
on the middle and leg, pushed back down the pitch
nicely done, walks across and picks it up beautifully to place it wide of fine leg
chopped away a few yards wide of third man, has enough time to scamper back for the second, he's in fine nick
four more, this is poor stuff, straying on the pads, flicks it away fine to beat the fielder in the deep, what a way to get to his fifty, he's the key man
slightly fullish outside off, slaps it down the ground towards long-off, just a single
the runs are flowing now, short and wide, terrible stuff from Ishant, slashed away over point, fortunately for him the ball slows down as it dribbles towards the rope, gets a couple
a nice flourish this guy has, half-volley outside off, drives hard at it, the bottom-hand comes off, ends up slicing it towards third man for a single
slip in place and Darren goes back to cut to sweeper cover
moves down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the ball and whips against the turn to deep midwicket
on the off stump line, doesn't turn away much, pushes it to cover point
hits it back to Harbhajan and Darren, who had backed up, dives to get back into the crease
slows up the pace and gets it to dip on Chanderpaul who lunges out to jab it away
quicker and shorter, cut to sweeper cover for a single
fires it quick, Chanderpaul, down the track, mistimes it towards long-off but falls short of Gambhir
quick again, slightly short, punched to Gambhir at long-off
Awesomeo. Chanderpaul goes down on his knee to swing it high over square leg.
But he has holed out to deep midwicket now. Chanderpaul moved down the track, Yusuf bowled on his legs and its flicked straight to the fielder.
quick one, skidding outside off stump and Darren is beaten, as he tries to nudge it to cover point
And again. Done in by the pace there
from round the stumps now, slightly short, mistimes the pull to midwicket
turns in from a length, jabbed away back down the pitch. Watch out for the doosra
turns in towards middle, nudged to the off side
the quickish topspinner outside off, slightly short, sliced away past point
quick and flat, turning in, defended off the back foot
comes down the track and so, Harbhajan fires it short and quick, Taylor mistimes the pull to midwicket Taylor
on the middle, clipped past square leg and they run hard to complete the second run
quick and straight, slight turn, jabbed to the off side for a single
slips down leg side and Taylor goes back to clip it past the short fine-leg fielder.
slower, full and on the middle, swept away for a single
on the middle stump line, nudged to backward point for a single.
steps down the track to pull a short delivery to long-on
from round the stumps, flighted delivery around the leg stump and Taylor sweeps and sweeps well. He swung it to deep backward square-leg boundary
stays right back to steer it to short third man for a quick single
Darren looked to step out but the bowler shortened the length and he top edged the pull to RP at deep midwicket. 99 from 69 balls. Just four wickets in hand.
still from round the stumps, full and outside off stump, Taylor has crashed it powerfully to the long-off boundary.
a tad slower, bit more air, a top spinner, Taylor went for the slog across the line and gets a top-edge over Dhoni's head.
spins down the leg side and Dhoni gathers. TAylor is surprised it hasn't been given a wide.
on the off and middle line, defended on the front foot
turns in with bounce and bounds off the pad to the off side and they rush across
skidded on from short of length towards the middle stump, Taylor went for the big pull, missed and was caught in front.
leans across to defend to the off side
hurls it quick but slips down the leg side
lunges forward to jab it away to the off side
full, straight, and quick, flicked away for a single
from over the wicket, spins in and turned to the on side
doosra on the off stump line, adjusts to stab ti to the off side
stays back to punch it to long-off
flighted loopy deliver, gets a leading edge over the bowler's head
tossed up outside off stump, driven to right of sweeper cover
floats it down the leg side and is swept away to fine-leg where Nehra stops it
takes a stride forward to lift it towards cowcorner
goes right back to push it towards short third man and they turn back for the overthrows
leans forward to turn to midwicket
almost stumped. It was jabbed to the off side, tries to set off for a run, lunges back to return. Dhoni stepped out and flicked the throw but missed the stumps
spins down the leg side again and Dhoni can't get across in time. Yuvraj makes a sliding stop to pull the ball back from the ropes
flighted full outside off stump, gets on the front foot, opens the bat-face and glides it through the vacant slip region
slower, turns in from outside off, pushed to cover
on the leg stump, nudged to left of Yuvraj at short fine-leg

run out chance missed by Dhoni. It was nudged to the off side, towards cover point. Not that far from the stumps, though. The striker set off for the run, no response from his partner. Dhoni charged after it, took couple of steps towards the stumps and under-armed a throw but missed the stumps
turned towards short third man for a single
again on that leg and middle stump line and Bernard sweeps it powerfully
goes back to punch it to long-on
quick delivery as usual, pushed back to the bowler
a tad slower, turns in towards middle, whipped to deep midwicket
stays adjacent to the line, guides to right of backward point
floated full, driven to long-off for a single
And another spinner goes down the leg side and it turns past Dhoni.
Yusuf floats this outside off stump, Ramdin edges the drive through the vacant slip region and it keeps running away to the boundary!
full and just outside off stump, guided to Gambhir at third man.
on the leg and middle, clipped straight to Ishant at short fine-leg.
short in length, mistimes the pull to right of midwicket
short in length, on the middle and leg, pulled to deep midwicket for a single
Bernard walks down the track and swings it powerfully to deep midwicket boundary and Rohit, who was a few metres inside the boundary, had to retreat and he lunged back to hold on to a good catch.
on the middle stump line, clipped to deep square leg for a single
skids away from Ramdin who tries to cut it but doesn't connect
short in length, swatted away for a single
full in length, just outside off stump, squeezed to backward point
RP bangs it in short but Benn does very well to pull it to deep square leg boundary. ROhti Sharma throws in a dive near the boundary but cant' stop the ball going past the ropes.
The tall Benn swings hard but this time straight to Rohit in the deep.
low full toss, pushed to Ishant at cover for a single. 38 from 24 balls.
paddle scoops it but will get just a single to fine-leg. 37 from 23
And it's a wide. Crowd roar. It was down the leg side. 36 from 23
full and straight, Benn crouches to push it past the bowler for a single. Ramdin on strike now.

Wallop! Fabulous hit over cowcorner. Benn had brought him back to strike and Ramdin responded with a big hit over the midwicket boundary. He took a stride out and swung it high and hard over the roeps.
Nerves. Nehra pushes this wide outside off stump. Two wides in the over. 28 from 21.
banged in short, Ramdin pulls but straight to midwicket where Ishant stops and fires in a throw at the non-strikers' end and misses. Had he hit, Ramdin would have been out. Now Benn on strike.
fullish delivery, flicked away to fine-leg for a single.
goes for the yorker, ends up a low swinging dipping full toss, swung away to deep midwicket. Ramdin retains the strike.
pushes it well outside off stump, Ramdin can't reach and Nigel Llong says that's wide. 24 from 18 balls. The crowd cheer.
The yips are setting in. Another wide well outside the off stump. Tony Cozier drawls, "West Indies could win in wides here!"
slightly slower, closer to the off stump, cut and a miss. Dhoni collects.
outside off stump, short in length, Ramdin wants to cut it over backward point but doesn't connect
full and straight, driven to mid-on for a single
Clatter! Full in length, moves in, Benn goes for the leg side, has a big swing but missed it completely. Baker walks in. 22 from 14.
Ah! yet another wide. This time down the leg side. Dhoni gathers and has a look at the scoreboard.
full, straight, on the off and middle, Baker leans forward to defend compactly.
again moves forward, gets behind the line of a length delivery and presents the full face in defense. Over to you Ramdin.

And India win the game by 20 runs. Ramdin went for the big hit over mid-off but couldn't clear the cordon. Harbhajan Singh takes the catch at mid-off and hugs Yuvraj.  Fine effort from West Indies to come close but no cigar. India might wonder how it go so close in the end despite the absence of any top-order batsmen or any power hitters. The wides and the numerous deliveries on and outside the leg stump would have made Dhoni lose some more hair.

Hang on for post-match ceremony.
